original_text: They tried to give Jesus some wine to drink. They had mixed some medicine into the wine. Jesus tasted it, but he would not drink it.
korean_text: 쓸개 탄 포도주를 예수께 주어 마시게 하려 하였더니 예수께서 맛보시고 마시고자 하지 아니하시더라

sentences.original_text: They tried to give Jesus some wine to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수에게 마실 와인을 주려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They had mixed some medicine into the wine
but he would not drink it
